text: Zadooki kabona n’aggya ejjembe ery’amafuta mu weema,1:39 Eweema eyogerwako wano ye weema Dawudi gye yakolera essanduuko ey’endagaano ya Katonda. Eweema ey’Okukuŋŋaanirangamu eyazimbibwa, ng’Abayisirayiri bakyali mu ddungu, yali ekyali e Gibyoni (3:4; 2Sa 6:17) n’afuka amafuta ku Sulemaani. Awo ne bafuuwa ekkondeere, abantu bonna ne baleekaana mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka nti, “Kabaka Sulemaani awangaale.”
